channel.title: Adding NPC Chat (is there a release for this?)
channel.description:
I'm wondering if anyone has released, or knows of, an easier way to add NPC chat than manually implementing it?
I remember months/years ago someone was demonstrating a java program which added NPC chat into RSCE (I think) very easily and required no coding experience and I was hoping someone had released something similar to this.
